data.title: Liar Liar — Rideau Lakes Public Library
data.meta_description: Liar Liar — Mlynowski, Sarah — Answering the plea of the fairy Celeste, Abby and her brother Jonah enter the world of Pinocchio to try and help Gepetto convince his wooden puppet son to straighten out his life and go to school--but things get complicated when Pinocchio sneaks into thereal world.
data.text:
Liar LiarLiar Liar

First edition.

Title rated 4.4 out of 5 stars, based on 5 ratings( 5 ratings )
